actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to prohibit any State from imposing a tax on the income derived by any individual from services in a Federal area within such State if such individual is not a resident or domiciliary of such State or of any other State which imposes a tax on income.

summary.text: Prohibits any State from imposing a tax on the income derived by any individual from services in a Federal area within such State if such individual is not a resident or domiciliary of such State or of any other State which imposes a tax on income. (Amends 4 U.S.C. 106 (b)).

titles.title: A bill to prohibit any State from imposing a tax on the income derived by any individual from services in a Federal area within such State if such individual is not a resident or domiciliary of such State or of any other State which imposes a tax on income.
